name: Curse of the Cowboy
description:
Inputs

- Arrow Keys: move the character
- Z: shot
- X: jump
- C: transform into Minotaur (only works at night)

Team Developed by the Magical Dog Entertainment Team
  • Programmer: Adriano Veríssimo
    • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/adrianoverissimo/
    • https://adrverissimo.itch.io/
  • Music: Andrea Vargas
    • http://gamesoundsbr.wixsite.com/andrea-cvr
  • SFX: Rodrigo Andrade e Andrea Vargas
  • Art: Rodrigo Andrade
    • Portfólio: https://twitter.com/bslrodrigo
